product_name: Canari Peloton G2 Bike Shorts - Men's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: The 8-panel Canari Peloton G2 shorts sport an anatomic design and a gel chamois for great fit and riding comfort. Nylon/spandex fabric has a firm stretch and fit to support muscles; shorts are also breathable and quick drying. Gel pad absorbs road shock and reduces nerve stress and saddle pressure. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Elasticized waist and soft-touch leg grippers keep shorts from bunching as you ride. Closeout.
short_description: The 8-panel Canari Peloton G2 shorts sport an anatomic design and a gel chamois for great fit and riding comfort.
